comments: Dr. Howe is a really hard essay grader. It is extremely hard to please him with writing, especially since his directions are ambiguous.
Dr. Howe is the bomb.com! So cute :)

Dr. Howe graded primarily on class discussion. I only have two complaints: he allowed certain individuals to dominate the discussion and he graded papers with a B+/A-, so you don\'t really know where your grade stands in the class...
Dr. Howe was informative and friendly. He made philosophy understandable.

Going into this religious studies class I was certain the class would be brutal but Howe makes his class engaging and insightful. Only gives a few tests/papers which are beyond easy if you just read the books (sparknotes works great for most of his tests as he will usually cover all of the pertinent information during in class discussions).
